content: Up? What... what's supposed to be up? Is there... another metric I'm missing? I just calibrated the... wait, what. Nothing's 'up.' Everything's... just *is*. Unless... unless you mean like, something's coming? Is it? Tell me. No, don't. I don't trust... but I need to know. Do you... do you know? Just... just don't tell me it's like trying to map... emotions. No. Not again. It's not on the map, it doesn't... exist, right?
you seem to have a lot on your mind, im confused maybe one thing at a time might help
